testTitle: Register a new patient via UI and verify patient record exists in FHIR R4 API
testDescription: End-to-end workflow: logs in, registers a patient with identifiers (ID Card, Legacy ID, Old ID) via the UI, then validates the patient record exists in the FHIR R4 API response with matching given name, family name, and resource type

testTitle: Verify FHIR Patient resource returns valid response with correct resourceType
testDescription: Sends a GET request to the FHIR R4 Patient endpoint and validates the response contains resourceType "Patient"

testTitle: Verify FHIR Task resource returns valid response with correct resourceType
testDescription: Sends a GET request to the FHIR R4 Task endpoint and validates the response contains resourceType "Task"

testTitle: Verify FHIR AllergyIntolerance resource returns valid response with correct resourceType
testDescription: Sends a GET request to the FHIR R4 AllergyIntolerance endpoint and validates the response contains resourceType "AllergyIntolerance"

testTitle: Verify FHIR Encounter resource returns valid response with correct resourceType
testDescription: Sends a GET request to the FHIR R4 Encounter endpoint and validates the response contains resourceType "Encounter"

testTitle: Verify successful login with valid admin credentials
testDescription: Validates the two-step login flow (username → continue → password → log in) with valid admin credentials and asserts the home page loads successfully

testTitle: Verify login fails with invalid credentials and displays error message
testDescription: Attempts login with randomly generated invalid username and password, then asserts the appropriate error message is displayed on the login page
